title: When did you meet BTS? What is your first reaction for BTS? - Quora

response.answer_text: My first reaction was..ergh, auto tune much.. don’t judge ok, I felt like I had to stick with Emo music other wise I would get mocked (which I do btw) but then I tried them again and I really liked them, I’ll tell you how I reacted when I saw the members(my first video was dna 🙄) tae: omg he’s hot frick!! yoongi: cuuute as hell namjoon: ok he looks different I like it!! He so hot jimin: oooh! Cute plump lips (😂) jin: he is the most masculine he looks fit jungkook: he looks so young! Surely he’s like 15 but handsome hoseok: eeeew (what was I thinking I’m so sowwy hobi)

my first reaction : i. love. this. man’s. eyeshadow. w. t. f. the man being jimin and no kidding that was my first reaction. I got to know about their existence in 2016 (idk wtf i was doing before that) and was instantaneously attracted to them like without having any negative thoughts which I thank myself for. Although my bias prolly changed every second cause i didn’t know who was who and everyone’s so amazing. That was my initial reaction and might I add, I’m proud to say that I’m a full time army and I’m so grateful and honoured to be a part of this amazing fam. stay safe y’alls ~zak  (the picture’s not mine :)
